name: Shrek hotel V3
description:
One Night At Shrek's Hotel | Demo V0.3

NEW UPDATES: 

-The door bug is fixed, some chengs on start animation UI, Warning added,  jumpscare is changed.

-I just realised I messed up…so basically I was working on the full version game (5 nights at Shrek’s hotel) then I decided to give a update out…so I copy and paste the code from the full version to version 0.2, and I forgot to change (5 night) to (1 night). So right now if you play the game and go to speak to Shrek for first time…the player would ask “Hi, can I get a room for 5 night please?”.  Please ignore my mess.

This game is about a guy who goes to a hotel to rest for a night...the manager of the hotel is Shrek and he is a serial murderer and you need to survive one night at his hotel!

This game is the second indie horror game I made. Please let me know what you think about the game in the description, and please report any bugs or lags. Thank you.

The full game is coming soon!... I might add the backrooms to the game bcz I really love one!

 I hope you all enjoy my game.

FOR THOSE WHO ARE INTERESTED...

-if you think you can write cool and scary stories and gameplays for this kind of game please Email me because I really need someone to do that for me. Thank you
